name: Complex Sensor Actuator Relationships
description:
Imagine if you will:
If we put experience on actuators to learn how to use them.
There is a GPS Sensor, a Sonar sensor mounted to rotate, and Tank Style actuators.

Now imagine a platform environment with an obstacle (you can run into the obstacle, you can fall off the edge).

How do you reliably update your GPS location?
How do you know when you can safely move forward?
Does it help if we fix the sensor (three at 0, 90 degrees)? (we'll know there is an obstacle in front, we'll know when we are next to a ledge)
How do we tease out the experience?
